unpublishedAction.name: getAllAuthSignPersons

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
OID,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ID,
CUSTOMER_OID,
CUSTOMER_ID,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ENTITY_TYPE,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_TYPE,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_IS_AUTH_SIGN,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_OTHERS_INFO,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_PARTNER_PERC,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_FIRSTNAME,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_MIDDLENAME,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_LASTNAME,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_MOTHERNAME,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_FATHERNAME,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_DOB,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_TAX_ID,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_NATIONALITY,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_RES_TAX_PURPOSE,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_DESIGNATION,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_PASSPORT_NO,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_PASSPORT_EXPIRE_DATE,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ACCESS_AS,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_DIN_DPIN,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_LINE1,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_LINE2,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_CITY,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_DISTRICT,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_STATE,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_COUNTRY,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_ZIP,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_MOBILE,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_EMAIL,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_HOLD_PERC,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_IS_POLITICALEXPOPER,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_IS_MINOR,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_GENDER,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_GUARDIAN_NAME,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_GUARDIAN_RELATIONSHIP,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_GOVT_ID,
CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_TYPE,
CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_LINE1,
CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_LINE2,
CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_CITY,
CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_DISTRICT,
CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_ZIP,
CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_STATE,
CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_COUNTRY,
CUSTOMER_REG_PHONE_NO,
CUSTOMER_REG_PHONE_EXTEN,
CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_LINE1,
CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_LINE2,
CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_CITY,
CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_DISTRICT,
CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_ZIP,
CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_STATE,
CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_COUNTRY,
CUSTOMER_COMM_PHONE_NO,
CUSTOMER_COMM_PHONE_EXTEN
FROM APS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_PERSON_DETAILS
WHERE 
CUSTOMER_OID = {{appsmith.store.customerOID}} 
AND (CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ENTITY_TYPE = {{'Entity Administrator Person'}} OR CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ENTITY_TYPE = {{'Auth Signatory Person India'}}
OR CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ENTITY_TYPE = {{'Auth Signatory Person Foreign'}} OR  CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_IS_AUTH_SIGN = 1 )

invalids: 'Query timeout' field must be an integer between 0 and 60000
